testcase.name: getUnfilledWord should return a valid string for a valid length()
revealChar should return the same currentWord for non existing char in wordToGuess()
revealChar should return the same wordToGuess when the last hidden char is passed()
getUnfilledWord should return an empty string for 0 length()
revealChar should reveal an non revealed char()
revealChar should return the same currentWord for an already revealed char()
